p: Regarding the length of the colon, we found that the colon was significantly ( p < 0.001) shorter in the negative control than in the normal control. Interestingly, treatment with Combretin A and B (50 mg/kg, p < 0.001) and prednisolone (4 mg/kg, p < 0.01) prevented the shortening of the colon significantly ( Figure 3(a)).
